name: Triticum
Relationship: Compare: TRADESCANTIA; (Hemorrhage from ear and upper air passages; painful urination, urethral discharge; scrotum inflamed). CHIMAPH.; SENECIO; POPULUS TREM.; BUCHU; UVA.POLYTRICHUM JUNIPERINUM - Ground Moss - (Painful urination of old people; dropsy, urinary obstruction and suppression).

Nose: Urine is dense and causes irritation of the mucous surfaces

details: An excellent remedy in excessive irritability of the bladder, dysuria, cystitis, gonorrhea.
dosage: Tincture or infusion by boiling two ounces in a quart of water until it is reduce to a pint. To be taken in four doses in 24 hours.
